meanings.def: the act or process of producing babies, young animals or plants
examples: They are studying reproduction in shellfish.

meanings.def: the act or process of producing copies of a document, book, picture, etc.
examples: Use a black pen on white paper to ensure good reproduction.
Digital recording gives excellent sound reproduction.

meanings.def: a thing that has been reproduced, especially a copy of a work of art
examples: They have a catalogue with colour reproductions of the paintings for sale.
reproduction furniture (= furniture made as a copy of an earlier style)
an exact reproduction of an ancient building
a reproduction from an old book
The quality of a photographic reproduction decreases with time.
